translation: Chapter IV.4 of the Pastoral Commentary of the Bodhisattvas

source_sentence: 「爾時，五人即至佛所，以所得物供養世尊及比丘僧。
translation: "At that point, five people went to the Buddha and made offerings to the Bhagavān and the monks with the things they had.

source_sentence: 供養已，復白佛言：『世尊！
translation: After making their offerings, they then said to the Buddha, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 惟願如來授我阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記，令於賢劫成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。』
translation: May the Tathāgata grant me the assurance of attaining unsurpassed, correct enlightenment in a good eon."

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: "Good sons!

source_sentence: 爾時，寶藏如來即與五人授阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記：『手龍！
translation: It was then that the Ratnagarbha Tathāgata gave five people the assurance of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment: 'Hands, dragon!

source_sentence: 汝於來世賢劫之中，當得成佛，号堅音如來，十号具足。
translation: In the next generation, among the good eons, you will become a buddha named Tathāgata Firm Voice, complete with the ten epithets.

source_sentence: 堅音如來般涅槃後，陸龍次當作佛，号快樂尊如來，十号具足。
translation: After the Tathāgata Firm Voice Tathāgata's parinirvāṇa, the land dragon will next become a buddha, called the Happy One Tathāgata, complete with ten epithets.

source_sentence: 快樂尊佛般涅槃後，水龍次當成佛，号導師如來，十号具足。
translation: After the blissful Tathāgata attains parinirvāṇa, Dragon of Water then becomes Buddha, and is called the Guide Tathāgata, complete with ten epithets.

source_sentence: 導師佛般涅槃後，虛空龍次當成佛，號愛清淨如來，十號具足。
translation: After the guiding Buddha's parinirvāṇa, the Ākāśaprāpta dragon will then become a buddha, and he'll be called the Tathāgata of Love and Purity, with ten perfect names.

source_sentence: 愛清淨佛般涅槃後，妙音龍次當作佛，号那羅延勝葉如來，十號具足。』
translation: After the parinirvāṇa of the Avalokitêśvara Buddha, the Marvelous Sound Dragon will next become a Buddha, called the Tathāgata Nārāyaṇa Vairocana, with ten full titles.'

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: "Good sons!

source_sentence: 寶藏如來記是五人賢劫成佛已，寶海梵志復告持力捷疾：『善男子！
translation: After the Ratnagarbha Tathāgata had recorded that these five people had become buddhas in the good eon, the Baokai Brahmā again told the Śrī Jigyeśas, 'Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝今可取種種莊嚴淨妙世界，如心所憙，便可發願，與一切眾生甘露法味，專心精勤行菩薩道，慎莫思惟劫數長遠。』
translation: Now, you can take these various adorned, pure, and marvelous worlds and vow to share the taste of the ambrosial dharma with all sentient beings as your mind joys, concentrate your mind and diligently practice the bodhisattva path, and don't think twice about the longevity of eons.'

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 爾時，梵志捉持力捷疾臂，將至佛所。
translation: At the time, the priest grasped his arm with great speed and was about to go to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 至佛所已，坐於佛前，白佛言：『世尊！
translation: When he reached the Buddha, he sat down in front of him and said to him, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 未來之世，於賢劫中，有幾佛向如來出世？』
translation: In the coming age, how many buddhas will appear in the world to the Tathāgata during the good eon?'

source_sentence: 爾時，佛告持力捷疾言：『善男子！
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed Śāriputra and said, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 半賢劫中有千四佛出現於世。』
translation: In half a billion eons, a thousand or four buddhas appear in the world.'

source_sentence: 「持力捷疾言：『世尊！
translation: "Ts'ai Chos kyi rasped, saying, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 彼賢劫中諸佛世尊般涅槃已，最後妙音龍成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，号那羅延勝葉。
translation: After those buddhas and world-honored beings of the good eon attained parinirvāṇa, the last of them, Sumeru the Dragon, became an unsurpassed, correct enlightenment called Nārāyaṇa-deva.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我願於爾時修菩薩道，修諸苦行，持戒、布施、多聞、精進、忍辱、愛語、福德、智慧，種種助道悉令具足。
translation: At the time, I vowed to cultivate the bodhisattva path, cultivate ascetic practices, observe precepts, generosity, be well-versed, make effort, tolerate humiliation, love language, virtue, and wisdom, and to complete all of the various paths that aid in that endeavor.

source_sentence: 賢劫諸佛垂成佛時，願我在初奉施飲食，般涅槃後收取舍利，起塔供養。
translation: When the buddhas of the good eons are about to become buddhas, may I serve food and drink at the beginning and collect the relics after parinirvāṇa to erect a stūpa and make offerings.

source_sentence: 護持正法，見毀戒者，勸化安止，令住持戒；遠離正見墮諸見者，勸化安止，令住正見；散亂心者，勸化安止，令住定心；無威儀者，勸化安止，住聖威儀。
translation: I would protect the right Dharma and encourage those who see a violation of the precepts to be calmed and made to uphold the precepts, those who are free from right view and fall into other views to be encouraged to be calmed and made to uphold right view, those whose minds are distracted to be encouraged to be calmed and made to uphold a concentrated mind, and those who lack restraint to be encouraged to be calmed and made to uphold noble restraint.

source_sentence: 若有眾生欲行善根，我當為其開示善根。
translation: If there are sentient beings who want to practice good roots, I will reveal the good roots for them.

source_sentence: 彼諸世尊般涅槃後，正法垂滅，我於爾時當護持之，令不斷絕，於世界中，然正法燈。
translation: After the parinirvāṇa of those world-honored ones, the right teaching will soon cease, and at that point, I will guard it so that it doesn't cease, and I will remain a lamp of the right teaching in the world.

source_sentence: 刀兵劫時，我當教化一切眾生，持不殺戒乃至正見，於十惡中，拔出眾生，安止令住十善道中，滅諸盲冥，開示善法。
translation: During the eon of swords and armies, I will teach all sentient beings to observe the precept against killing and right view, uproot sentient beings from the ten evils, stabilize them in the ten good paths, extinguish blindness, and reveal the good Dharma.

source_sentence: 我當滅此劫濁、命濁、眾生濁、煩惱濁、見濁，令無有餘。
translation: I will extinguish the turbidity of eons, lives, sentient beings, afflictions, and views, so that there's nothing left.

source_sentence: 於飢饉劫，我當勸化一切眾生，安止住於檀波羅蜜，乃至般若波羅蜜亦如是。
translation: During the eon of famine, I'll encourage all sentient beings to abide stably in the perfection of giving, even if it's the perfection of wisdom.

source_sentence: 我勸眾生住六波羅蜜時，眾生所有一切飢餓、黑闇、穢濁、怨賊、鬪諍，及諸煩惱，悉令寂靜。
translation: When I encourage sentient beings to abide in the six perfections, all of their hunger, hunger, darkness, impurity, resentments, quarrels, and other afflictions will be quelled.

source_sentence: 於疾疫劫，我當教化一切眾生，悉令住於六和法中，亦令安止住四攝法，眾生所有疾疫、黑闇，當令滅盡。
translation: During the epidemic eon, I'll teach all sentient beings to abide in the six harmonizing qualities and cause them to abide calmly in the four inclusive qualities, which will bring about the cessation of all the epidemics and darkness in sentient beings.

source_sentence: 於半賢劫，斷滅眾生如是苦惱。
translation: In half an eon of wisdom, I'll end the suffering and distress of sentient beings like this.

source_sentence: 一千四佛於半劫中出世、涅槃、正法滅已，然後我當成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: After 1,000 or four buddhas have appeared in the world and ceased to exist and the true teaching in half an eon, then I will achieve supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 如千四佛所得壽命、聲聞弟子，我之壽命、聲聞弟子，亦復如是等無差別。
translation: Just as the life span of 1,000 or 4 buddhas and their disciples are acquired, my life span and my disciples are likewise, without distinction.

source_sentence: 如千四佛於半劫中調伏眾生，願我亦於半賢劫之中調伏眾生。
translation: Just as a thousand or four buddhas disciplined sentient beings in half an eon, may I also discipline sentient beings in half an eon of goodness.

source_sentence: 是半劫中，諸佛所有聲聞弟子，毀於禁戒，墮在諸見，於諸佛所，無有恭敬，生於瞋恚、惱害之心，破法壞僧、誹謗賢聖，毀壞正法、作惡逆罪。
translation: During those half an eon, those śrāvaka disciples of the buddhas violated the precepts, fell into various views, didn't have respect for the buddhas, became angry and harmful, broke the Dharma and destroyed the saṃgha, denigrated the good and noble, disrupted the right Dharma, and committed bad and rebellious acts.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，悉當拔出於生死污泥，令入無畏涅槃城中。
translation: When I achieve supreme perfect enlightenment, I'll pull out the sludge of birth and death and cause them to enter the fearless city of nirvāṇa.

source_sentence: 我般涅槃後，正法賢劫一時滅盡。
translation: After I attain nirvāṇa, the eons of the good and righteous Dharma will all cease at once.

source_sentence: 若我涅槃，正法賢劫俱滅盡已，我之齒骨并及舍利，悉當變化作佛形像，三十二相瓔珞其身，一一相中有八十種好，次第莊嚴，遍至十方無量無邊無佛世界，一一化佛以三乘法，教化無量無邊眾生，悉令不退。
translation: After my nirvāṇa and the cessation of both the good eons of the right Dharma, my teeth and bones and relics will all be transformed into buddha images, with thirty-two diademed bodies and eighty kinds of beauty in each diadem, which will be adorned in order and reach measureless, limitless, and Buddhaless worlds in the ten directions, each transforming buddhas with the teachings of the three vehicles and teaching measureless, limitless sentient beings, all of whom will not retreat.

source_sentence: 若彼世界病劫起時，無有佛法，是化佛像亦當至中，教化眾生如前所說。
translation: If there's a world that's been without the Buddha's teachings since the onset of an eon of illness, these images of the transformation buddha will also reach it and teach sentient beings as explained above.

source_sentence: 若諸世界無珍寶者，願作如意摩尼寶珠，雨諸珍寶，自然發出純金之藏。
translation: If there are worlds without treasures, may he create a wish-granting maṇi-jewel that will rain down treasures and naturally emit a store of pure gold.

source_sentence: 若諸世界所有眾生，離諸善根，諸苦纏身，我當於中，雨憂陀娑香、栴檀沈水、種種諸香，令諸眾生斷煩惱病、諸邪見病、身四大病，於三福處，勤心修行，令命終時，生天人中。
translation: If all the sentient beings in the world are free of good roots and are tormented by suffering, I will rain down the scent of udassa, sandalwood, and various other fragrances to cause sentient beings to end the illnesses of affliction, the illnesses of mistaken views, and the four major physical illnesses, and to diligently cultivate the three merits so that, when their lives end, they'll be born among gods and humans.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我行菩薩道時，當作如是利益眾生。
translation: When I practice the bodhisattva path, I should do this to benefit sentient beings.

source_sentence: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，當作如是佛事。
translation: After I achieve supreme perfect enlightenment, I will do this as a buddha.

source_sentence: 般涅槃後，舍利復至無量世界，如是利益眾生。
translation: After parinirvāṇa, the Śāriputra will again go to measureless worlds and thus benefit sentient beings.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: "'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若我所願不成不得己利，不能與諸眾生作大醫王，不能利益者，我今便為欺誑十方無量世界在在處處現在諸佛如來，今者亦復不應與我授阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: If I don't fulfill my vows and don't get my own benefits, and if I can't be a great king of doctors for sentient beings and don't get to benefit them, then I would be deceiving the Tathāgatas and Buddhas present in measureless worlds in the ten directions, and I wouldn't be granted the unsurpassed, correct, and complete assurance of enlightenment now.

source_sentence: 世尊所與無量無邊億阿僧祇眾生授阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記者，我亦不得見如是人，亦不聞佛音聲、法僧之聲、行善法聲，常墮阿鼻地獄中。
translation: Nor could I have seen such a person or heard the sound of the Buddha's voice, the voice of the Dharma and Saṃgha, or the sound of practicing good principles, and I would have always fallen into the avīci hell.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若我所願成就得己利者，如來今者當稱讚我。』
translation: If I were to accomplish what I want for my own benefit, the Tathāgata would praise me now.'

source_sentence: 「時，佛即讚持力捷疾：『善哉！
translation: "At that point, the Buddha praised Mañjuśrī for his ability to quickly respond, 'Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Bravo!

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝於來世作大醫王，令諸眾生離諸苦惱，是故字汝為火淨藥王。』
translation: In a future life, you'll be a great king of doctors, freeing sentient beings from suffering and distress; therefore, I'll call you the king of purifying medicines by fire.'

source_sentence: 「佛告火淨藥王：『汝於來世，過一恒河沙等阿僧祇劫，入第二恒河沙阿僧祇劫後分，賢劫中一千四佛垂成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，汝當悉得奉施飲食，乃至如上汝之所願。
translation: "The Buddha told the Fire-Purifying Medicine King, 'In the next life, after an incalculably long eon, you'll enter the second incalculably long eon and accomplish supreme perfect enlightenment by attaining 1,000 or 4 buddhas in that eon, and you'll be able to give food and drink to all of them, even as you've vowed above.

source_sentence: 那羅延勝葉般涅槃後，正法滅已，汝當成於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，號樓至如來、應、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊，壽命半劫，汝之所得聲聞弟子，如千四佛所有弟子等無差別；所化眾生，般涅槃後，正法滅已，賢劫俱盡，齒骨舍利悉化作佛，乃至生天人中，亦復如是。』
translation: After the parinirvāṇa of Vairocana Nārāyaṇa and the cessation of the true teaching, you will achieve unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment and will be called Rucika, the Tathāgata, the Worthy, the Perfectly Omniscient, the Perfectly Virtuous, the Well Gone, the Worldly Understander, the Unsurpassed One, the Trainer, the Teacher of Gods and Humans, the Buddha, and the World Honored One, with a lifespan of half an eon, and there will be no difference between the disciples of the śrāvakas you have attained and the disciples of the 1,000 or 4 buddhas you've trained; after the parinirvāṇa and the cessation of the true teaching, the good eons will all end, and the relics of their teeth and bones will be transformed into buddhas, even if they are born among gods and humans.

source_sentence: 「爾時，火淨藥王菩薩復白佛言：『世尊！
translation: "At the time, the fiery Pure Medicine King Bodhisattva again said to the Buddha, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若我所願成就得己利者，惟願如來，以百福莊嚴金色之手摩我頂上。』
translation: If I were to achieve what I want for my own benefit, may the Tathāgata touch my head with the golden hand adorned with a hundred blessings.'

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 爾時，寶藏如來即以百福莊嚴之手，摩火淨藥王頂上。
translation: At that point, the Ratnagarbha Tathāgata then put his hand adorned with a hundred blessings on the top of the fire-purifying Medicine King.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: "Good sons!

source_sentence: 爾時，火淨藥王菩薩見是事已，心生歡喜，即以頭面，禮於佛足，却住一面。
translation: Seeing this, the Fire-Purifying Medicine King Bodhisattva rejoiced, saluted the Buddha's feet with his head and face, and withdrew to one side.

source_sentence: 「爾時，寶海梵志以天妙衣與火淨藥王菩薩，而讚之曰：『善哉！
translation: "It was then that the Baokai Brahmā gave the Fire-Purifying Medicine King Bodhisattva some of his heavenly robes and praised him, saying, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Bravo!

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝之所願甚奇甚特。
translation: 'Your wish is rare and extraordinary.

source_sentence: 從今已往更不須汝與我策使，常得自在修安樂行。』」
translation: From now on, you and I won't be required to guide you, so you'll always be free to practice in comfort.'"

source_sentence: 爾時，佛告寂意菩薩：「善男子！
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed the Bodhisattva Śivi, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 時寶海梵志作是思惟：『我今已勸無量無邊百千億那由他眾生，令住阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: The Jeweled Sea priest then had this thought, 'Now, I've encouraged measureless and limitless tens of billions of nayutas to abide in unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 我今見是諸大菩薩各各發願取淨佛土，唯除一人婆由毘紐。
translation: Now, I see all these great bodhisattvas who have each made the vow to purify the Buddha's land, except for one, Vayuvinho.

source_sentence: 此賢劫中其餘菩薩亦離五濁，我今當於是末世中，以真法味與諸眾生，我今當自堅牢莊嚴作諸善願，如師子吼，悉令一切菩薩聞已，心生疑怪，歎未曾有。
translation: Now, in these good eons, the other bodhisattvas have also parted with the five turbidities, so now, in this final age, I will share with sentient beings the taste of the true Dharma, and I will firmly adorn myself with good vows like a lion's roar that will cause all the bodhisattvas who hear them to become suspicious and admire them as unprecedented.

source_sentence: 復令一切大眾天龍、鬼神、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人及非人，叉手恭敬，供養於我，令佛世尊稱讚於我，并授記莂，令十方無量無邊在在處處現在諸佛，為諸眾生講說正法。
translation: Furthermore, I will cause all the masses of gods, dragons, ghosts, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans and non-humans to bow their palms in respect and make offerings to me, cause the Bhagavān to praise me, and grant me assurance of future enlightenment so that measureless and limitless buddhas will appear everywhere in the ten directions to teach the right teaching to sentient beings.

source_sentence: 彼諸如來聞我師子吼者，悉讚歎授我阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記，亦遣使來，令諸大眾悉得見之。
translation: Those tathāgatas who heard my lion's roar praised me and granted me the assurance of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment, and they also sent an envoy to make sure the whole world could see them.

source_sentence: 我今最後發大誓願，成就菩薩所有大悲，乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，若有眾生聞我大悲名者，悉令生於希有之心，若於後時，有諸菩薩成就大悲者，亦當願取如是世界，是世界中所有眾生飢虛於法，盲無慧眼，具足四流，是諸菩薩當作救護而為說法。
translation: Now, after I finally make the great vow to achieve all the bodhisattvas' great compassion and accomplish unsurpassed, corrected, and complete enlightenment, if there are sentient beings who hear my name of great compassion, they will all give rise to a rare state of mind, and if, at some point later on, there are bodhisattvas who have achieved great compassion, they will also wish to possess a world in which all the sentient beings in that world are starved of the Dharma, blind, and lacking the eye of wisdom, and are fully endowed with the four currents, and those bodhisattvas will rescue them and preach to them.

source_sentence: 我乃至般涅槃已，十方無量無邊百千億諸世界中，在在處處現在諸佛，於諸菩薩大眾之中稱讚我名，亦復宣說我之善願，令彼菩薩以大悲勤心，皆專心聽聞是事已，心大驚怪，歎未曾有。
translation: Even after I attain parinirvāṇa, there will be buddhas everywhere in the measureless, limitless, 100,000,000,000,000 worlds in the ten directions who will praise my name among the masses of bodhisattvas and also proclaim my good vows, causing those bodhisattvas to concentrate their minds and hear about them with great compassion and diligence, and then they'll be greatly surprised and admire them as unprecedented.

source_sentence: 先所得悲，皆更增廣，如我所願，取不淨土。
translation: Their previously attained compassion is increased and expanded, and they obtain the impure land as I had wished.

source_sentence: 是諸菩薩皆如我，於不淨世界成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，拔出四流眾生，安止令住於三乘中乃至涅槃。』
translation: Like me, these bodhisattvas achieve supreme perfect enlightenment in the impure world, uproot the four streams of sentient beings, and stabilize them in the three vehicles until they reach nirvāṇa.'

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: "Good sons!

source_sentence: 爾時，寶海梵志思惟如是大悲願已，偏袒右肩，至於佛所。
translation: After contemplating this great vow of compassion, Brahmā Baokai bared his right shoulder and went to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 爾時，復有無量百千萬億諸天，在虛空中作天伎樂，雨種種華，各各同聲而讚歎言：『善哉！
translation: At the time, there were measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of gods in the sky, creating celestial music and raining flowers of various kinds, each praising with one voice, saying, 'Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Bravo!

source_sentence: 善大丈夫！
translation: A good, great man!

source_sentence: 今至佛所發奇特願，欲以智水滅於世間眾生煩惱。』
translation: Now, I've come to the Buddha's place and made a marvelous vow to use the waters of wisdom to extinguish the afflictions of sentient beings in the world.'

source_sentence: 爾時，一切大眾合掌恭敬，在梵志前同聲禮敬而讚歎言：『善哉！
translation: At that point, all the people joined their palms in respect, saluted and venerated the Brahmā with one voice, and praised him, saying, 'Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Bravo!

source_sentence: 尊大智慧！
translation: Venerable Great Wisdom!

source_sentence: 我等今者得大利益，能作牢堅諸善願也。
translation: Now, we've attained a great benefit, and we're able to make firm good vows.

source_sentence: 我等今者，願聞尊意所發善願。』
translation: Now, we'd like to hear about the good vows made by your honorable intentions.'

source_sentence: 「爾時，梵志在於佛前，右膝著地。
translation: "At the time, the priest was present before the Buddha, with his right knee on the ground.

source_sentence: 爾時，三千大千世界六種震動，種種伎樂不鼓自鳴，飛鳥走獸相和作聲，一切諸樹生非時華，三千大千世界之中，因地眾生於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，若已發心、若未發心，惟除地獄、餓鬼、下劣畜生，其餘眾生皆悉生於大利益心、純善之心、無怨賊心、無穢濁心、慈希有心。
translation: At the time, six things in the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds shook, various kinds of music and instruments sounded without drums, birds and animals walked together, all the trees produced flowers at non-regulation times, and in the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds, causal sentient beings attained unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment if they had arisen the mind or hadn't arisen the mind, except for hell, hungry ghosts, and inferior animals, but all other sentient beings developed a mind of great benefit, a purely virtuous mind, a mind without enmity, a mind without defilement, and a mind with a rare capacity for compassion.

source_sentence: 飛行眾生尋住於空，心生歡喜，散種種華、末香、塗香，種種伎樂、幢幡、衣服而以供養，柔軟妙音讚詠梵志，皆悉一心欲聞梵志所發善願。
translation: The flying sentient beings who seek to abide in emptiness become joyous at heart, scattering various flowers, powdered and smeared incense, making offerings with various kinds of music, banners, and clothing, and praising the Brahman with soft, marvelous sounds, all with one mind intent on hearing the good vows that the Brahman has made.

source_sentence: 乃至阿迦貳吒天天上諸天亦下閻浮提，在虛空中，散種種華、末香、塗香，種種伎樂、幢幡、衣服而以供養，柔濡妙音讚詠梵志，精勤一心欲聞梵志所發善願。
translation: Even the gods above Akaniṣṭha and those below Jambudvīpa scattered various flowers, powdered and smeared incense, made offerings with music, banners, and clothing, sang praises to Brahmā with a gentle, wonderful voice, and focused their minds on hearing the good vows that Brahmā had initiated.

source_sentence: 「爾時，寶海梵志叉手恭敬以偈讚佛：「『遊戲禪定，　　如大梵王；　　光明端嚴，　　如天帝釋；　　捨財布施，　　如轉輪王；　　持妙珍寶，　　如主藏臣；　　功德自在，　　如師子王；　　不可傾動，　　如須彌山；　　心不波蕩，　　如大海水；　　於罪不罪，　　其心如地；　　除諸煩惱，　　如清淨水；　　燒諸結使，　　如火猛焰；　　無諸障閡，　　猶如大風；　　示現實法，　　如四天王；　　所雨法雨，　　如大龍王；　　充足一切，　　猶如時雨；　　破諸外道，　　如大論師；　　功德妙音，　　如須曼華；　　說法妙音，　　猶如梵天；　　除諸苦惱，　　如大醫王；　　等心一切，　　如母愛子；　　攝取眾生，　　猶如慈父；　　身不可壞，　　如金剛山；　　能斷愛枝，　　猶如利刀；　　廣度生死，　　猶如船師；　　以智濟人，　　猶如舟船；　　光明清涼，　　如月盛滿；　　開眾生華，　　如日初出；　　能與眾生，　　沙門四果；　　猶如秋樹，　　生諸果實；　　僊聖圍遶，　　猶如鳳凰；　　其意深廣，　　猶如大海；　　等心眾生，　　猶如草木；　　知諸法相，　　如觀空拳；　　等心行世，　　平如水相。
translation: 「爾時，寶海梵志叉手恭敬以偈讚佛：「『遊戲禪定，　　如大梵王；　　光明端嚴，　　如天帝釋；　　捨財布施，　　如轉輪王；　　持妙珍寶，　　如主藏臣；　　功德自在，　　如師子王；　　不可傾動，　　如須彌山；　　心不波蕩，　　如大海水；　　於罪不罪，　　其心如地；　　除諸煩惱，　　如清淨水；　　燒諸結使，　　如火猛焰；　　無諸障閡，　　猶如大風；　　示現實法，　　如四天王；　　所雨法雨，　　如大龍王；　　充足一切，　　猶如時雨；　　破諸外道，　　如大論師；　　功德妙音，　　如須曼華；　　說法妙音，　　猶如梵天；　　除諸苦惱，　　如大醫王；　　等心一切，　　如母愛子；　　攝取眾生，　　猶如慈父；　　身不可壞，　　如金剛山；　　能斷愛枝，　　猶如利刀；　　廣度生死，　　猶如船師；　　以智濟人，　　猶如舟船；　　光明清涼，　　如月盛滿；　　開眾生華，　　如日初出；　　能與眾生，　　沙門四果；　　猶如秋樹，　　生諸果實；　　僊聖圍遶，　　猶如鳳凰；　　其意深廣，　　猶如大海；　　等心眾生，　　猶如草木；　　知諸法相，　　如觀空拳；　　等心行世，　　平如水相。

source_sentence: 成就妙相，　　善於大悲，　　能與無量，　　眾生授記。
translation: Accomplishing marvelous characteristics, he's adept at great compassion and can give discernment to measureless sentient beings.

source_sentence: 我今調伏，　　無量眾生，　　惟願如來，　　與我授記，　　於未來世，　　成就勝道。
translation: Now, I've disciplined measureless sentient beings, so may the Tathāgata grant me the assurance that I'll achieve the excellent path in future lives.

source_sentence: 微妙智慧，　　大僊世尊，　　願以妙音，　　真實說之。
translation: Subtle wisdom, honored one, may the great immortal truly explain it in a marvelous voice.

source_sentence: 我於惡世，　　要修諸忍，　　與諸結使，　　煩惱賊鬪，　　拔出無量，　　一切眾生，　　安止住於，　　寂滅道中。』
translation: 'In this bad world, I must cultivate patience, fight the bonds and afflictions, uproot measureless sentient beings, and abide stably in the path of cessation.'

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: "Good sons!

source_sentence: 寶海梵志說此偈讚佛已，是時一切大眾皆讚歎言：『善哉！
translation: After the Baokai priest spoke this verse in praise of the Buddha, all the people there then praised him, saying, 'Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Bravo!

source_sentence: 大丈夫！
translation: A great man!

source_sentence: 善能讚歎如來法王。』
translation: He's well able to praise the Tathāgata, the king of the Dharma.'

source_sentence: 「爾時，梵志復白佛言：『世尊！
translation: "At that point, the priest again said to the Buddha, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我已教化無量億眾，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，是諸眾生已各願取淨妙世界，離不淨土，以清淨心種諸善根，善攝眾生而調伏之。
translation: I've taught measureless millions of people to give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, and these sentient beings have each vowed to attain a pure, marvelous world, part with an impure land, plant good roots with a pure mind, and skillfully gather sentient beings and tame them.

source_sentence: 火鬘摩納等一千四人，皆悉讀誦毘陀外典，如來已為是諸人等，授其記莂，於賢劫中當成為佛。
translation: Fourteen people, including Vimalamāṇa, have recited the non-Buddhist scriptures, and the Tathāgata has granted them the assurance that they will become buddhas in a good eon.

source_sentence: 有諸眾生多行貪婬、瞋癡、憍慢，悉當調伏於三乘中。
translation: All sentient beings who often engage in lust, anger, delusion, and arrogance will be disciplined within the three vehicles.

source_sentence: 是一千四佛所放捨者，所謂眾生厚重煩惱，五濁惡世能作五逆，毀壞正法，誹謗聖人，行於邪見，離聖七財，不孝父母，於諸沙門、婆羅門所，心無恭敬，作不應作，應作不作，不行福事，不畏後世，於三福處，無心欲行，不求天上人中果報，勤行十惡，趣三不善，離善知識，不知親近真實智慧，入於三有生死獄中，隨四流流沒在灰河，為癡所盲，離諸善業，專行惡業。
translation: These 1,000 or four buddhas release those sentient beings who are heavily afflicted, capable of committing the five heinous crimes in the five turbid bad states, disparaging the right teaching, denigrating sages, practicing wrong views, parting with the seven noble possessions, unfilial to parents, lacking respect in their hearts for ascetics and priests, performing tasks that shouldn't be performed and those that should be performed, not performing meritorious deeds, not fearing the afterlife, lacking the intention to perform in the three places of merit, not seeking the rewards of heavenly existence or among humans, diligently practicing the ten evils, heading for the three unwholesome destinies, departing from good teachers, not knowing the true wisdom, entering the hell of birth-and-death in the three realms, drowning in the ash river following the four currents, blinded by delusion, departing from good actions and focusing on bad actions.

source_sentence: 如是眾生，諸佛世界所不容受，是故擯來集此世界，以離善業，行不善業行，於邪道重惡之罪積如大山。
translation: Such sentient beings are not tolerated in the buddha-realm, so they're rebuffed and gathered here in this world to abandon good actions and perform unskillful deeds, and the heavy sins of the wrong path accumulate like a great mountain.

source_sentence: 爾時，娑婆世界賢劫中，人壽命千歲，是一千四佛大悲不成，不取如是弊惡之世，令諸眾生流轉生死，猶如機關無有救護、無所依止、無舍無燈，受諸苦惱而反捨放，各各願取淨妙世界。
translation: At the time, in the good eon of the sahā world, a person's life expectancy was a thousand years, and these 1,400 buddhas didn't have the great compassion to accept such a bad world and cause sentient beings to go through birth and death like a man with no protection, no support, no refuge, and no lamp, suffering and distress but abandoning it, each wishing to take the pure and wonderful world.

source_sentence: 淨土眾生已自善調，其心清淨已種善根，勤行精進，已得供養無量諸佛而更攝取。
translation: The sentient beings of the pure land have themselves been well-adjusted, their minds purified, they've planted good roots, they've applied themselves diligently, and they've been able to make offerings to measureless buddhas and furthermore to gather them in.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是諸人等，為實爾不？』
translation: Is this true of all of you?'

source_sentence: 「爾時，世尊即告梵志：『實如所言。
translation: "At that point, the Bhagavān addressed the priest, 'It's just as it says.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 是諸人等，如其所憙，各取種種嚴淨世界，我隨其心已與授記。』
translation: These people, according to their desire, will each choose a variety of adorned and purified worlds, and I will give them a prediction according to their minds.'

source_sentence: 「爾時，梵志復白佛言：『世尊！
translation: "At that point, the priest again said to the Buddha, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今心動如緊花樹葉，心大憂愁，身皆燋悴，此諸菩薩雖生大悲，不能取此五濁惡世，今彼諸眾生，墮癡黑闇。
translation: Now, my mind is shaken like a clinging petal tree, my heart is greatly distressed, and my body is scorched, and even though these bodhisattvas have shown great compassion, they can't apprehend this five turbid and evil worlds, and now those sentient beings have fallen into the darkness of delusion.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 乃至來世，過一恒河沙等阿僧祇劫，入第二恒河沙等阿僧祇劫後分，賢劫中人壽千歲，我當爾時行菩薩道，久在生死忍受諸苦，以諸菩薩三昧力故，要當不捨如是眾生。
translation: From that time until the next world, after one incalculably long eon, I'll enter the second incalculably long eon and live a thousand years in that eon.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今自行六波羅蜜調伏眾生，如佛言曰：「以財物施，名檀波羅蜜。」
translation: Now, I make my own six perfections for disciplining sentient beings, just as the Buddha said, "Giving with property is called the perfection of giving."

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我行檀波羅蜜時，若有眾生世世從我乞求所須，向其所求，要當給足，飲食、醫藥、衣服、臥具、舍宅聚落、華香、瓔珞、塗身之香，供給病者醫藥、侍使、幢幡、寶蓋、錢財、穀帛、象馬、車乘、金銀、錢貨、真珠、琉璃、頗梨、珂貝、璧玉、珊瑚、真寶、偽寶、天冠、拂飾，如是等物，我於眾生乃至貧窮，生大悲心悉以施與，雖作是施，不求天上人中果報，但為調伏攝眾生故，以是因緣，捨諸所有。
translation: When I was practicing the perfection of giving, if there were sentient beings who asked for what they needed from me from generation to generation and asked for it, I would give them enough, including food, medicine, clothing, bedding, housing and quarters, flowers, jewelry, body-painting incense, medicines for the sick, attendants, banners, banners, jewelry, money, grain, silk, elephants, horses, chariots, gold, silver, money, genuine pearls, beryl, pāri, kopecks, jade, coral, genuine and counterfeit jewelry, a heavenly crown, ornaments, and so forth, and I would give them all to sentient beings, even the poor, with great compassion.

source_sentence: 若有眾生，乞求過量，所謂奴婢、聚落、城邑、妻子、男女、手脚、鼻舌、頭目、皮血、骨肉、身命，乞求如是過量之物。
translation: If there are sentient beings who ask for an inordinate amount of things, such as slaves, servants, villages, towns, wives, men, women, hands, feet, noses, tongues, heads and eyes, skin and blood, flesh and bones, and bodies, they'll ask for such inordinate amounts of things.

source_sentence: 爾時，我當生大悲心，以此諸物，持用布施，不求果報，但為調伏攝眾生故。
translation: At that point, I will give rise to the mind of great compassion and use these things as alms, not seeking rewards but simply to tame and bring sentient beings into line.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我行檀波羅蜜時，過去菩薩行檀波羅蜜者所不能及，未來菩薩當發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，行檀波羅蜜者亦不能及。
translation: When I practiced the perfection of giving, past bodhisattvas who practiced the perfection of giving couldn't match it, and future bodhisattvas who will arouse the mind of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment won't match it either.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我於來世為行菩薩道故，於百千億劫當行如是檀波羅蜜。
translation: In the next life, I will practice this kind of perfection of giving for a hundred billion eons in order to practice the bodhisattva path.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 未來之世若有欲行菩薩道者，我當為是行檀波羅蜜，令不斷絕。
translation: "If there are people in future generations who want to practice the bodhisattva path, I will practice the perfection of giving for them, so that they won't be cut off.

source_sentence: 「『我初入尸羅波羅蜜時，為阿耨多羅三藐三菩提故，持種種戒，修諸苦行，如檀中說，觀我無我故，五情不為五塵所傷。
translation: "'When I first entered the perfection of śīla, I observed various precepts and cultivated ascetic practices for the sake of the unsurpassed, correct practices, as explained in the perfection of giving, and it was because I observed that I'm without self that the five feelings aren't harmed by the five dust motes.

source_sentence: 此羼提波羅蜜，我如是行羼提波羅蜜亦如上說，觀有為法，離諸過惡，見無為法，微妙寂滅。
translation: This kṣanti-pāramitā, which I thus practice, is also like the above, observing that existent dharmas are free of faults and errors and seeing that the nonexistent dharmas are delicately tranquil.

source_sentence: 精勤修集，於無上道不生退轉。
translation: Striving to cultivate it, I don't falter on the unsurpassed path.

source_sentence: 此毘梨耶波羅蜜，我亦如是行毘梨耶波羅蜜。
translation: As this vīrya-pāramitā, I too will thus practice vīrya-pāramitā.

source_sentence: 若一切處修行空相得寂滅法，是名禪波羅蜜。
translation: If the practice of emptiness in all places results in the cessation of dharmas, this is called the perfection of meditation.

source_sentence: 若解諸法，本無生性，今則無滅，是名般若波羅蜜。
translation: If I understand that all dharmas are originally unarisen and now lack cessation, this is called the perfection of prajñā.

source_sentence: 我於無量百千億阿僧祇劫，堅固、精勤、修集般若波羅蜜。
translation: For measureless hundreds of millions of incalculable eons, I've resolutely and diligently cultivated the perfection of prajñā.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 或有菩薩於過去世，不為阿耨多羅三藐三菩提行菩薩道，堅固、精勤、修集般若波羅蜜，未來之世或有菩薩，未為阿耨多羅三藐三菩提行菩薩道，堅固、精勤、修集般若波羅蜜，是故我今當於來世發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，修菩薩道，令諸善法無有斷絕。
translation: Perhaps there were bodhisattvas in past lives who didn't practice the bodhisattva path for the sake of the unsurpassed, correct, and diligent enlightenment and who resolutely and diligently cultivated the perfection of wisdom, and perhaps there will be bodhisattvas in future lives who haven't yet practiced the bodhisattva path for the sake of the unsurpassed, correct, and diligent enlightenment and who will resolutely and diligently cultivate the perfection of wisdom, so now I will arouse the aspiration for the unsurpassed, correct, and diligent enlightenment and cultivate the bodhisattva path in future lives so that there will be no cutting off of good qualities.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: "'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我初發心已，為未來諸菩薩等，開示大悲，乃至涅槃。
translation: After I first set out to teach future bodhisattvas and others about great compassion, right up to nirvāṇa.

source_sentence: 有得聞我大悲名者，心生驚怪，歎未曾有。
translation: Anyone who hears my name of great compassion will be surprised and admire it as unprecedented.

source_sentence: 是故我於布施，不自稱讚、不依持戒、不念忍辱、不猗精進、不味諸禪，所有智慧不著三世，雖行如是六波羅蜜，不求果報。
translation: Therefore, I don't praise myself for my almsgiving, don't rely on observing precepts, don't think about forbearance, don't make effort, don't taste meditations, and don't attach to the three times for all my wisdom, and although I practice these six perfections, I don't seek their rewards.

source_sentence: 有諸眾生離聖七財，諸佛世界之所擯棄，作五逆罪，毀壞正法，誹謗賢聖，行於邪見，重惡之罪，猶如大山，常為邪道之所覆蔽；是故我今為是眾生專心莊嚴，精勤修集六波羅蜜。
translation: There are sentient beings who part with the seven noble assets, are rejected by the Buddha world, commit the five heinous crimes, disparage the right teaching, denigrate good and noble people, and conduct wrong views, committing heavy crimes like a great mountain that's always obstructed by wrong paths; therefore, for these sentient beings, I concentrate my mind on adornment and diligently cultivate the six perfections.

source_sentence: 我為一一眾生種善根故，於十劫中，入阿鼻地獄受無量苦，畜生、餓鬼，及貧窮、鬼神、卑賤人中，亦復如是。
translation: Because I plant good roots in each and every sentient being, I'll go to the avīci hell for 10 eons and experience measureless suffering, and so will animals, hungry ghosts, poor people, ghosts, spirits, and lowly people.

source_sentence: 若有眾生，空無善根，失念燋心，我悉攝取而調伏之，令種善根，乃至賢劫，於其中間，終不願在天上人中受諸快樂，惟除一生處兜術天待時成佛。
translation: If there are sentient beings who are empty and lack good roots and lose their mindfulness and scorch their hearts, I will gather them all in and tame them so that they will cultivate good roots up to a good eon, during which they'll never wish to experience the pleasures of heavenly existence or humans but will only be reborn in the Tuṣita Heaven to become buddhas when the time comes.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: "'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我應如是久處生死，如一佛世界微塵等劫，以諸所須供養諸佛，為一眾生種善根故，以一佛世界微塵數等諸供養具，供養十方無量無邊一一諸佛，亦於十方無量無邊一一佛所，得如一佛世界微塵數等諸善功德，於一一佛前，復得教化如一佛世界微塵數等眾生，令住無上菩提之道，緣覺、聲聞亦復如是，隨諸眾生所願而教。
translation: Thus, I should remain in birth-and-death for a long time, making all the necessary offerings to the buddhas for the sake of one sentient being in a dusty eon, making offerings to each of the buddhas in the ten directions in a number of dusty eons, and making offerings to each of the buddhas in the ten directions in a number of dusty eons, attaining a number of good qualities like the number of dusty eons in the world of one buddha, and then teaching sentient beings like the number of dusty eons in the world of one buddha to abide on the path to unsurpassed enlightenment, and so do pratyekabuddhas and direct disciples, teaching sentient beings according to their desires.

source_sentence: 若有世界佛未出世，願作僊人，教諸眾生，令住十善，五神通中，遠離諸見。
translation: If there's a world where buddhas have yet to arise and wish to become immortals, they can teach sentient beings to abide in the ten good qualities and the five supernormal powers, free from views.

source_sentence: 若有眾生事摩醯首羅天，我願化身如摩醯首羅，而教化之，令住善法。
translation: If there are sentient beings who are born in the Mahêśvara Heaven, I wish to transform my body into that of Mahêśvara and teach them to abide in the good Dharma.

source_sentence: 事八臂者，亦願化為八臂天身，而教化之，令住善法。
translation: For those who serve the eight-armed gods, may they also be transformed into the bodies of the eight-armed gods and be taught to abide in the good Dharma.

source_sentence: 事日月梵天，亦願化為日月梵身，而教化之，令住善法。
translation: He who serves the sun and moon brahma gods also wishes to be transformed into the body of a sun and moon brahma god, and he teaches and teaches it to abide in the good Dharma.

source_sentence: 有事金翅鳥，乃至事兔，願化為兔身隨而教化，令住善法。
translation: Whether he's working with a garuḍa or a rabbit, may he be transformed into the body of a rabbit and teach it, so that it will abide in the good Dharma.

source_sentence: 若見飢餓眾生，我當以身血肉與之令其飽滿。
translation: If I see a hungry sentient being, I'll give them my flesh and blood to fill them up.

source_sentence: 若有眾生犯於諸罪，當以身命代其受罪為作救護。
translation: If there are sentient beings who commit crimes, I'll give my life to take their place and rescue them.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: "'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 未來世中有諸眾生，離諸善根，燒滅善心。
translation: "In the future, there will be sentient beings who part with their good roots and burn out their good mind.

source_sentence: 我於爾時，為是眾生當勤精進行菩薩道，在生死中受諸苦惱，乃至過一恒河沙等阿僧祇劫，入第二恒河沙等阿僧祇劫後分，初入賢劫，火鬘摩納成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，字拘留孫如來時，我所教化離諸善業、行不善業、燒燋善心、離聖七財、作五逆罪、毀壞正法、誹謗聖人、行於邪見、重惡之罪，猶如大山，常為邪道之所覆蔽，無佛世界所棄捐者，令發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，行檀波羅蜜，乃至行般若波羅蜜，安止住於不退轉地，皆令成佛，在於十方如一佛土微塵數等諸佛世界轉正法輪，令諸眾生於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，種諸善根，出離惡道，安止得住，功德智慧助菩提法者，願我爾時悉得見之。
translation: At the time, when I was teaching these sentient beings to abandon good actions, perform unskillful actions, burn up good hearts, part with the holy seven assets, commit the five heinous crimes, disparage the right Dharma, denigrate sages, act in wrong views, and commit serious misdeeds, I was like a great mountain that's always obstructed by wrong paths and abandoned by the Buddha-world, causing them to arouse the mind of unsurpassed, practice the perfection of giving, practice the perfection of wisdom, stand still at the ground of nonretrogression, and cause them to become buddhas, turning the right Dharma wheel in a world of buddhas as numerous as the dust of a single Buddha-land in the ten directions, so that sentient beings will plant good roots, escape bad paths, stand still, and attain the bodhisattva dharma that's supported by merit and wisdom, may I then see them all.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: "'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有諸佛在在處處，遣諸眾生至於佛所，受阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記，令得陀羅尼三昧忍辱，即得次第上菩薩位，得於種種莊嚴世界，各各悉得隨意所求，取淨佛土，如是眾生悉是我之所勸化者。
translation: "If there are buddhas present in various places who send sentient beings to the Buddha to receive the assurance of unsurpassed, corrected, and dignified enlightenment, then they attain the rank of superior bodhisattva and attain the various adorned worlds where they can each seek what they want and obtain a pure buddha land, and such sentient beings are all the ones I encourage to teach.

source_sentence: 入賢劫中，拘留孫佛出世之時，如是等眾，亦於十方如微塵等諸佛世界，成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，在在處處住世說法亦令我見。
translation: When Kauśāmbī appeared in the eons of goodness, such people also became unsurpassed, perfected, and perfected the enlightenment of buddhas like dust in ten directions, and they stayed in each place and taught the Dharma in the world so that I could see them.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: "'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 拘留孫佛成佛之時，我至其所，以諸供具而供養之，種種諮問出家之法，持清淨戒，廣學多聞，專修三昧，勤行精進，說微妙法，唯除如來餘無能勝。
translation: When Kauśāmbī became Buddha, I went to his place, made offerings to him, consulted with him about the rules for leaving home, observed pure precepts, studied extensively, cultivated samādhi, performed diligently, and taught subtle dharmas that no one but the Tathāgata could surpass.

source_sentence: 是時，或有鈍根眾生無諸善根，墮在邪見，行不正道，作五逆罪，毀壞正法，誹謗聖賢，重惡之罪猶如大山，我時當為如是眾生，說於正法攝取調伏；佛日沒已，我於其後，自然當作無量佛事。
translation: If there are sentient beings with dull faculties who lack good roots, fall into mistaken views, practice an incorrect path, commit the five heinous crimes, disparage the right teaching, and denigrate noble and virtuous people, and their serious crimes are like a great mountain, then I will explain the right teaching to such sentient beings, collect and tame them, and naturally perform measureless Buddha-works after the Buddha's day has passed.

source_sentence: 伽那迦牟尼、迦葉佛等住世說法，乃至自然作於佛事，亦復如是。
translation: It's likewise true of Kanakamuni and Kāśyapa when they teach in the world and naturally perform Buddha-works.

source_sentence: 乃至人壽千歲，我於爾時勸諸眾生，於三福處，過千歲已，上生天上，為諸天人講說正法，令得調伏。
translation: Until I live a thousand years, I then encourage sentient beings to go up to heaven after spending more than a thousand years in the three places of merit, where I teach the right Dharma for gods and humans and cause them to be disciplined.

source_sentence: 乃至人壽百二十歲，爾時眾生愚癡自在，自恃端正種姓豪族，有諸放逸、慳悋、嫉妬，墮在黑闇五濁惡世，厚重貪欲、瞋恚、愚癡、憍慢、慳悋、嫉妬、非法行欲、非法求財、行邪倒見、離聖七財、不孝父母，於諸沙門婆羅門所不生恭敬，應作不作，作不應作，不行福事不畏後世，不勤修集於三福處，不樂三乘，於三善根不能修行，專為三惡，不修十善，勤行十惡，其心常為四倒所覆，安止住於四破戒中，令四魔王常得自在，漂在四流五蓋蓋心。
translation: 乃至人壽百二十歲，爾時眾生愚癡自在，自恃端正種姓豪族，有諸放逸、慳悋、嫉妬，墮在黑闇五濁惡世，厚重貪欲、瞋恚、愚癡、憍慢、慳悋、嫉妬、非法行欲、非法求財、行邪倒見、離聖七財、不孝父母，於諸沙門婆羅門所不生恭敬，應作不作，作不應作，不行福事不畏後世，不勤修集於三福處，不樂三乘，於三善根不能修行，專為三惡，不修十善，勤行十惡，其心常為四倒所覆，安止住於四破戒中，令四魔王常得自在，漂在四流五蓋蓋心。

source_sentence: 當來世中如是眾生，六根放逸，行八邪法，入大罪山，起諸結縛，不求天上人中果報，邪倒諸見，趣於邪道，行於五逆，毀壞正法，誹謗聖人，離諸善根，貧窮下賤，無所畏忌，不識恩義，失於正念，輕蔑善法，無有智慧，不能學問，破戒諛諂，以嫉妬心於所得物不與他分，互相輕慢無有恭敬，懶惰懈怠諸根缺漏，身體羸劣乏於衣服，親近惡友處胎失念，以受種種苦惱故惡色燋悴，其眼互視無慚無愧，互相怖畏於一食頃，身口意業所作諸惡無量無邊，以能為惡故得稱歎。
translation: 當來世中如是眾生，六根放逸，行八邪法，入大罪山，起諸結縛，不求天上人中果報，邪倒諸見，趣於邪道，行於五逆，毀壞正法，誹謗聖人，離諸善根，貧窮下賤，無所畏忌，不識恩義，失於正念，輕蔑善法，無有智慧，不能學問，破戒諛諂，以嫉妬心於所得物不與他分，互相輕慢無有恭敬，懶惰懈怠諸根缺漏，身體羸劣乏於衣服，親近惡友處胎失念，以受種種苦惱故惡色燋悴，其眼互視無慚無愧，互相怖畏於一食頃，身口意業所作諸惡無量無邊，以能為惡故得稱歎。

source_sentence: 爾時，眾生專共修集斷常二見，堅著五陰危脆之身，於五欲中深生貪著，常起忿恚、怨賊之心，欲害眾生，心常瞋惱穢濁麤朴，未得調伏慳恡貪著，不捨非法無有決定，互相畏怖起於諍競，以穢濁心共相殺害，遠離善法，起無善心作諸惡業，於善不善不信果報，於諸善法起違背心，於滅善法生歡喜心，於不善法起專作心，於寂滅涅槃起不救心，於持戒沙門、婆羅門所生不敬心，於諸縛結起悕求心，於老病死起深信心，於諸煩惱起受持心，於五蓋法起攝取心，於正法幢起遠離心，於諸見幢起竪立心，常起相違輕毀之心，共起鬪諍相食噉心，各各相違共相侵陵，攝取怨恨惱亂之心，於諸欲惡起無厭心，於他財物起嫉妬心，於受恩中起不報心，於諸眾生起賊盜心，於他婦女起侵惱心。
translation: 爾時，眾生專共修集斷常二見，堅著五陰危脆之身，於五欲中深生貪著，常起忿恚、怨賊之心，欲害眾生，心常瞋惱穢濁麤朴，未得調伏慳恡貪著，不捨非法無有決定，互相畏怖起於諍競，以穢濁心共相殺害，遠離善法，起無善心作諸惡業，於善不善不信果報，於諸善法起違背心，於滅善法生歡喜心，於不善法起專作心，於寂滅涅槃起不救心，於持戒沙門、婆羅門所生不敬心，於諸縛結起悕求心，於老病死起深信心，於諸煩惱起受持心，於五蓋法起攝取心，於正法幢起遠離心，於諸見幢起竪立心，常起相違輕毀之心，共起鬪諍相食噉心，各各相違共相侵陵，攝取怨恨惱亂之心，於諸欲惡起無厭心，於他財物起嫉妬心，於受恩中起不報心，於諸眾生起賊盜心，於他婦女起侵惱心。

source_sentence: 是時眾生，一切心中無有善願，是故常聞地獄聲、畜生聲、餓鬼聲、疾病聲、老死聲、惱害聲、八難聲、閉繫聲、杻械枷鏁縛束聲、奪他財物侵惱聲、瞋恚輕毀呵責聲、破壞眾人和合聲、他方國賊兵甲聲、飢餓聲、穀貴偷盜聲、邪婬妄語狂癡聲、兩舌惡言綺語聲、慳貪嫉妬攝取聲、若我我所鬪諍聲、憎愛適意不適意聲、恩愛別離憂悲聲、怨憎集聚苦惱聲、各各相畏僮僕聲、處胎臭穢不淨聲、寒熱飢渴疲極聲、耕犁種殖怱務聲、種種工巧疲厭聲、疾病患苦羸損聲，是時眾生各各常聞如是等聲。
translation: 是時眾生，一切心中無有善願，是故常聞地獄聲、畜生聲、餓鬼聲、疾病聲、老死聲、惱害聲、八難聲、閉繫聲、杻械枷鏁縛束聲、奪他財物侵惱聲、瞋恚輕毀呵責聲、破壞眾人和合聲、他方國賊兵甲聲、飢餓聲、穀貴偷盜聲、邪婬妄語狂癡聲、兩舌惡言綺語聲、慳貪嫉妬攝取聲、若我我所鬪諍聲、憎愛適意不適意聲、恩愛別離憂悲聲、怨憎集聚苦惱聲、各各相畏僮僕聲、處胎臭穢不淨聲、寒熱飢渴疲極聲、耕犁種殖怱務聲、種種工巧疲厭聲、疾病患苦羸損聲，是時眾生各各常聞如是等聲。

source_sentence: 如是眾生斷諸善根，離善知識常懷瞋恚，皆悉充滿娑婆世界，悉是他方諸佛世界之所擯棄，以重業故。
translation: Such sentient beings cut off their good roots, part with good friends, and always harbor anger, and they all fill the sahā world, which is rejected by the buddha worlds of other directions because of heavy karma.

source_sentence: 於賢劫中壽百二十歲，如是眾生業因緣故，於娑婆世界受其卑陋，成就一切諸善根者之所遠離。
translation: During the good eon, they live for 120 years, and as a result of their actions, such sentient beings are subjected to the humble world of Sahava, which is a place far removed from those who have accomplished all good roots.

source_sentence: 娑婆世界其地多有鹹苦、鹽鹵、土沙、礫石、山陵、垖阜、谿谷、溝壑、蚊虻、毒蛇，諸惡鳥獸充滿其中，麤澁惡風非時而起，當於非時惡雹雨水，其雨水味毒酢鹹苦，以是雨故，生諸藥草、樹木、莖節、枝葉、華果、百穀諸味皆悉雜毒，如是非時麤澁惡濁雜毒之物，眾生食已增益瞋恚，顏色燋悴無有潤澤，於諸眾生心無慈愍，誹謗聖人，各各無有恭敬之心，常懷恐怖，共相殘害，生惱亂心，噉肉飲血，剝皮而衣，執持刀杖，勤作殺害，自恃豪族，色相端正，讀誦外典，便習鞍馬，善用刀矟，弓箭射御，於自眷屬生嫉妬心，若諸眾生修習邪法受種種苦。
translation: The Saha world's land is full of salty, bitter, salty, sandy soil, gravel, hills, mountains, mountains, valleys, gullies, biting insects, poisonous snakes, and harsh birds and animals, and it's filled with coarse and unseasonable winds that arise at odd times, and at odd times there's bad hail and rain that has a poisonous, vinegary, and salty taste, so that this rain produces medicinal plants, trees, stems, leaves, flowers, fruits, and all the flavors of grains that are poisonous, such as harsh, coarse, and poisonous products at odd times.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: "'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 願我爾時從兜術天下生最勝轉輪王家，若自在王家，處在第一大夫人胎，為諸眾生調伏其心，修善根故。
translation: May I then be born from the Tuṣita Heaven into the family of the most excellent wheel-turning king, or if I were to enter the family of the king, I would be placed in the first great wife's womb, so as to tame the minds of sentient beings and cultivate their good roots.

source_sentence: 尋入胎時，放大光明，其光微妙遍照娑婆世界，從金剛際上至阿迦尼吒天，令彼所有諸眾生等，若在地獄、若在畜生、若在餓鬼、若在天上、若在人中、若有色、若無色、若有想、若無想、若非有想、若非無想，悉願見我微妙光明，若光觸身亦願得知。
translation: When I entered the womb, I magnified my light, and its radiance was so subtle that it shone everywhere in the Saha world, from the limit of the vajra up to the Akaniṣṭha Heaven, causing all sentient beings there, whether in hell, in animals, in hungry ghosts, in heaven, among humans, with or without form, with or without perception, without perception, with or without perception, to wish to see my subtle radiance, or to wish to know if the light touched their bodies.

source_sentence: 以見知光故，悉得分別生死過患，勤求無上寂滅涅槃，乃至一念斷諸煩惱，是名令諸眾生初種涅槃之根栽也。
translation: Because they see and know the light, they can discern the faults of birth and death, diligently pursue unsurpassed tranquility and nirvāṇa, and even stop the afflictions with a single thought, which is called planting the first root of nirvāṇa in sentient beings.

source_sentence: 願我處胎於十月中，得選擇一切法、入一切法門，所謂無生空三昧門，於未來世無量劫中說此三昧，善決定心不可得盡。
translation: May I remain in the womb for ten months and be able to discriminate all things and enter all dharma-gates, which is called the samādhi-gate of nonarising emptiness, and explain this samādhi in innumerable eons in the future, with a mind of good determination that can't be exhausted.

source_sentence: 若我出胎成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，彼諸眾生，我當拔出令離生死，如是等眾悉令見我。
translation: If I were to emerge from the womb and achieve supreme perfect enlightenment, I would uproot all those sentient beings and cause them to part with birth and death, and such people would all see me.

source_sentence: 雖處母胎滿足十月，然其實是住珍寶三昧，結加趺坐，正受思惟。
translation: Although he's been in his mother's womb for the full ten months, he actually abides in the concentration of precious treasures, sits cross-legged, and correctly experiences deliberation.

source_sentence: 十月滿已從右脇出，以一切功德成就三昧力故，令娑婆世界，從金剛際上至阿迦尼吒天六種震動，其中眾生或處地獄、畜生、餓鬼、天上人中，悉得惺悟。
translation: When the tenth month is complete, he emerges from his right hypochondrium and, because of the power of the samādhi that he has achieved through all his virtues, causes six kinds of tremors in the Saha world, from the limit of the vajra up to the Akaniṣṭha Heaven, in which sentient beings either in hell, animals, hungry ghosts, or among humans in heaven will attain awakening.

source_sentence: 爾時，復有以微妙光明，遍照娑婆世界，亦得惺悟無量眾生。
translation: At the same time, there's also a subtle light that shines everywhere in the Sahava world that also brings awakening to measureless sentient beings.

source_sentence: 若有眾生未種善根，我當安止令種善根，於涅槃中種善根已，令諸眾生生三昧芽。
translation: If there are sentient beings who haven't yet planted good roots, I will calmly cause them to plant good roots, and after planting good roots in nirvāṇa, I'll cause sentient beings to grow the buds of samādhi.

source_sentence: 我出右脇足蹈地時，復願娑婆世界從金剛際上至阿迦尼吒天，六種震動，所有眾生依水、依地、依於虛空，胎生、卵生、濕生、化生，在五道者，悉得惺悟。
translation: When I step out of the right hypochondrium and touch the ground, I also wish that the six earthquakes in the Saha world, from the limit of the vajra up to the Akaniṣṭha Heaven, would cause all sentient beings relying on water, earth, and space, womb birth, egg birth, wet birth, and transformation birth, and those in the five destinies to attain awakening.

source_sentence: 若有眾生未得三昧，願皆得之，得三昧已，安止令住三乘法中不退轉地。
translation: If there are sentient beings who haven't yet attained samādhi, may they all attain it, and once they've attained it, may they be stabilized and enabled to stay in the stage of nonretrogression within the teachings of the three vehicles.

source_sentence: 我既生已，於娑婆世界所有諸天梵王魔天、忉利諸天及日月天、四天王、諸大龍王、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、化生神僊、夜叉、羅剎，悉令盡來共供養我。
translation: Once I've been born, all the gods of the sahā world, the Brahmā and Māra gods, the Heaven of the Thirty-three, the Sun and Moon gods, the four heavenly kings, the great dragon kings, the gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, creature gods, yakṣas, and rājas will all come together to make offerings to me.

source_sentence: 令我生已，尋行七步，行七步已，以選擇功德三昧力故，說於正法，令諸大眾心生歡喜，住於三乘。
translation: After allowing me to be born, he took seven steps in search of me, and after taking those seven steps, he explained the right teaching because of the power of the samādhi of selective qualities, which caused the hearts of the masses to rejoice and abide in the three vehicles.

source_sentence: 於此眾中，若有眾生學聲聞者，願盡此生便得調伏，若有習學緣覺乘者，一切皆得日華忍辱，有學大乘者，皆得執持金剛愛護大海三昧，以三昧力故，超過三住。
translation: Among them, if there are sentient beings studying the śrāvaka path, they'll wish to be disciplined for the rest of their lives; if there are those studying the pratyekabuddha path, they'll all attain the patience of the sunflower; and if there are those studying the great vehicle, they'll all attain the vajra-protecting ocean samādhi, which, by virtue of its powers, exceeds the three abodes.

source_sentence: 我於爾時悕求洗浴，願有最勝大龍王來洗浴我身，眾生見者即住三乘，所得功德如上所說。
translation: At the time, I longed for a bath, wishing for the most excellent great dragon king to come and bathe me, and for sentient beings who see that to abide in the three-vehicle meditative absorption, and the merits they'll attain are as described above.

source_sentence: 我為童子乘羊車時，所可示現種種伎術，為悟一切諸眾生故。
translation: When I was a boy riding in a goat cart, I showed various tricks that I could do to awaken all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 處在宮殿、妻子、綵女五欲之中，共相娛樂，見其過患，夜半出城，除諸瓔珞嚴身之具，為欲破壞尼揵子等諸外道師。
translation: When I'm in the midst of the five desires of palaces, wives, and courtesans, I entertain them together, see their faults, leave town at midnight, and remove my jewelry and body ornaments in order to disrupt the teachers of those non-Buddhists like Nirgrantha.

source_sentence: 恭敬衣服故，我著袈裟至菩提樹下，眾生見我處於菩提樹下，皆悉發願，欲令我速以一切功德成就三昧力說三乘法。
translation: Respecting my robes, I put on my robe and went under the bodhi tree, and when sentient beings saw me under the bodhi tree, they all vowed that I would quickly explain the teachings of the three vehicles with all the merits of samādhi power.

source_sentence: 聞是法已，於三乘中，生深重欲勤行精進。
translation: After hearing this teaching, they give rise to a deep desire to diligently apply themselves among the three vehicles.

source_sentence: 若有已發聲聞乘者，令脫煩惱，要一生在當於我所而得調伏；若有已發緣覺乘者，皆悉令得日華忍辱；若有已發大乘之者，皆得執持金剛愛護大海三昧，以三昧力故，超過四地。
translation: If there are those who have arisen in the śrāvaka vehicle, they'll be freed from affliction and will be able to subdue themselves in their lifetime in my place; if there are those who have arisen in the pratyekabuddha vehicle, they'll all attain the patience of the sunflower; and if there are those who have arisen in the great vehicle, they'll attain the vajra-protecting ocean samādhi, which, by virtue of its power, surpasses the four stages.

source_sentence: 我自受草於菩提樹下，敷金剛座處，結加趺坐，身心正直，繫念在於阿頗三昧，以三昧力故，令入出息，停住寂靜，於此定中，一日一夜，日食半麻半米，以其餘半，持施他人。
translation: I myself accept the grass under the bodhi tree, spread out my vajra throne, sit cross-legged, straighten my body and mind, fix my thoughts in the concentration of nonreturning, and because of the power of samādhi, I cause my in-and-out breath to stop and be still.

source_sentence: 我如是久遠修集苦行，娑婆世界上至阿迦尼吒，聞我名者，皆到我所，供養於我。
translation: As I've cultivated this ascetic practice for so long, people in the sahā world up to Akaniṣṭha who hear my name come to me and make offerings to me.

source_sentence: 我如是苦行，如是等眾悉當為我而作證明。
translation: Such a multitude of people will testify on my behalf as I thus conduct my ascetic practices.

source_sentence: 若有眾生於聲聞乘種善根者，世尊！
translation: Bhagavān, if there are sentient beings who have cultivated good roots in the vehicle of the direct disciples, then...

source_sentence: 願令是等於諸煩惱心得寂靜，若餘一生要至我所，我當調伏；緣覺、大乘，亦復如是。
translation: May I cause these people to experience tranquility in their afflictions, and if they want to come to me in another lifetime, I will tame them; likewise will the solitary realizers and great vehicle.

source_sentence: 若有諸龍、鬼神、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、餓鬼、毘舍遮、五通神僊，來至我所，供養於我。
translation: If dragons, ghosts, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, hungry ghosts, piśācīs, and the five supernormal celestials come to me and make offerings to me.

source_sentence: 我如是苦行，是等眾生皆為證明；若有已學聲聞、緣覺及大乘者，亦復如是。
translation: These sentient beings are proof of my austerities, and so are those who have studied the śrāvaka, pratyekabuddha, and great vehicle.

source_sentence: 若有四天下眾生，修於外道，麤食苦行，有諸非人往至其所說如是言：「卿等！
translation: If there are sentient beings in the four heavens who practice non-Buddhist, coarse food and ascetic practices, and some non-person comes to them and says, "Gentlemen!

source_sentence: 不能悉行諸苦，亦復不得大果報也，非是希有。
translation: It's not rare that someone can't practice all kinds of suffering and also doesn't attain great rewards.

source_sentence: 如我地分有一生菩薩行於苦行，復入如是微妙禪定身口意業，皆悉寂靜，滅出入息，一日一夜，日食半麻半米，如是苦行大得果報，得大利益多所開化，是苦行人不久當成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: Just as there's a lifelong bodhisattva in my region who engages in ascetic practices and then enters into this kind of subtle meditative concentration where his physical, verbal, and mental actions are all quiescent, he ceases to flow in and out, eats half a hempseed and half a grain of rice every day for a day and night, and thus attains the great rewards of his ascetic practices and obtains great benefits that are often enlightened, this ascetic will soon achieve supreme, perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 卿若不信我所言者，自可往至其所觀其所作。」
translation: If you don't believe what I've said, you can go to that place and see what it's doing."

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: "'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 願是諸人捨其所修，悉來我所觀我苦行；或有眾生已學聲聞乃至大乘，亦復如是。
translation: May all these people abandon their training and come to see my ascetic practices, or may there be sentient beings who have studied the śrāvaka path up to the great vehicle, and so it will be.

source_sentence: 若有諸王、大臣、人民，在家出家，一切見我行是苦行，來至我所供養於我；或有已學聲聞、緣覺、大乘，亦復如是。
translation: If there are kings, ministers, and people, both home and away, who see me practicing this asceticism and come to me to make offerings, or if there are sentient beings, pratyekabuddhas, or great vehicles that have trained, likewise.

source_sentence: 若有女人見我苦行，來至我所供養於我，是諸女人所受身分，即是後身；若有已學聲聞、緣覺、大乘，亦復如是。
translation: If there are women who see me practicing asceticism and come to me to make offerings to me, this is the status that women receive, which is their final body; if there are learned śrāvakas, pratyekbuddhas, or great vehicles, likewise.

source_sentence: 若有諸禽獸見我苦行，亦至我所，是諸禽獸於此命終，更不復受畜生之身；若有已發聲聞乘者，餘一生在要至我所，而得調伏；若有已發緣覺心者，亦復如是；乃至微細小蟲、餓鬼亦如是。
translation: If there are animals that see my ascetic practices and come to me, those animals won't be subject to the body of an animal again after their lives end; if there are those who have arisen in the vehicle of the disciples, the rest of their lives will be spent with me, and they'll be disciplined; if there are those who have arisen in the mind of the solitary realizers, likewise; even tiny worms and hungry ghosts will be likewise.

source_sentence: 我如是久遠苦行一結加趺坐時，有百千億那由他等無量眾生為我證明，如是眾生已於無量無邊阿僧祇劫種解脫子。
translation: When I was sitting cross-legged for such a long time in ascetic practice, there were a hundred billion nayutas and measureless other sentient beings who testified for me that such sentient beings had already planted the seeds of liberation in an incalculably long incalculable eon.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: "'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我如是苦行，過去眾生未曾有能作如是行，及餘外道、聲聞、緣覺、大乘之人，亦無有能作如是苦行。
translation: Such austerities on my part have never been possible for sentient beings in the past, nor have there been any other non-Buddhists, śrāvakas, pratyekbuddhas, or great vehicle people who have been able to do such austerities.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我如是苦行，未來眾生亦無能作，及餘外道、聲聞、緣覺、大乘之人，亦無能作如是苦行。
translation: Such austerities on my part won't be possible for future sentient beings to perform, nor will they be possible for other non-Buddhists, śrāvakas, pratyekbuddhas, or great vehicle people to perform such austerities.

source_sentence: 我未成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，已能作大事，所謂破壞魔王及其眷屬。
translation: Before I achieved unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, I was already able to do something great, which is to destroy the demon king and his retinue.

source_sentence: 我願破煩惱魔，成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，為一眾生安住阿羅漢勝妙果中，隨爾所時，現受殘業報身；如是第二眾生安住阿羅漢，第三第四亦復如是。
translation: After I destroyed the afflicting demons and achieved unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, I wanted to help one sentient being abide in the surpassing, wonderful fruit of the arhat and, at that point, experience the body of the results of residual activity; thus, the second sentient being abides in the arhat, and so does the third and fourth.

source_sentence: 我為一一眾生故，示現百千無量神足，欲令安住正見之中，為一一眾生故，說百千無量法門義，隨其所堪令住聖果，以金剛智慧，破一切眾生諸煩惱山，為諸眾生說三乘法，為一一眾生故，過百千由旬不乘神力，往至其所而為說法，令得安住無所畏中。
translation: For the sake of each and every sentient being, I've shown one hundred thousand measureless powers to cause them to abide in right view, explained one hundred thousand measureless teachings and meanings for the sake of each sentient being, made them abide in the noble fruit according to their ability, destroyed the mountains of affliction for all sentient beings with my adamantine wisdom, explained the teachings of the three vehicles for all sentient beings, and went over a hundred thousand leagues without riding on my powers to preach to each sentient being for the sake of that sentient being, so that they might abide in fearlessness.

source_sentence: 或有諸人於我法中欲出家者，願無障閡，所謂羸劣、失念、狂亂、憍慢，無有畏懼癡無智慧、多諸結使其心散亂。
translation: If there are people who want to leave home because of my teaching, may there be no obstruction, such as weakness, loss of mindfulness, confusion, pride, fearlessness, delusion, lack of wisdom, or numerous bonds that distract the mind.

source_sentence: 若有女人欲於我法出家學道受大戒者，成就大願。
translation: If there are women who want to leave home and train on my path and receive the great precepts, they'll fulfill the great vow.

source_sentence: 我諸四眾比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，悉得供養。
translation: The four of us, monks, nuns, laymen, and laywomen, will all be able to make offerings.

source_sentence: 願諸天人及諸鬼神得四聖諦，諸龍、阿修羅及餘畜生，受持八戒，修淨梵行。
translation: May gods, humans, and spirits attain the four noble truths, and may dragons, asuras, and the rest of the animal kingdom accept the eight precepts and cultivate a pure religious practice.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: "'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，若有眾生於我生瞋，或以刀杖火坑及餘種種，欲殘害我，或以惡言誹謗罵詈，遍十方界而作輕毀，若持毒食以用飯我；如是殘業，我悉受之，成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: "After I achieve supreme perfect enlightenment, if sentient beings become angry with me, or if they use a sword, stick, fire, or some other means to harm me, or if they speak harshly, slander, and ridicule me, or if they bring poisonous food to cook for me, I'll accept all of these cruel actions and achieve supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 往昔所有怨賊眾生，起於害心，種種惡言，以雜毒食，出我身血，如是等人，悉以惡心來至我所；我當以戒多聞三昧，大悲薰心，梵音妙聲而為說法，令彼聞已心生清淨，住於善法，所作惡業，尋便懺悔，更不復作，悉令得生天上人中，無有障閡，生天人中，得妙解脫，安住勝果，離諸欲惡，永斷諸流，障閡業盡，若諸眾生有殘業者，皆悉得盡無有遺餘。
translation: All those resentful beings from the past who had harmful thoughts, spoke evilly, fed on various poisons, and spilled my blood, such people would come to me with evil intentions; I would teach them with the concentration of learning much about precepts, perfuming their minds with great compassion, and the wonderful voice of Brahmā, causing them to become pure in mind after hearing them, abide in the good Dharma, find repentance for the bad actions they've done, and never do them again, so that they would all be born among gods and humans with no hindrances, be born among gods and humans, attain wonderful liberation, abide in excellent outcomes, part with desires and evils, permanently cut off streams, and end hindering karma; if sentient beings have residual karma, it will all be ended, leaving nothing behind.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: "'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，一切所有身諸毛孔，日日常有諸化佛出，三十二相瓔珞其身，八十種好次第莊嚴。
translation: "After I achieve supreme perfect enlightenment, every day there will be transformation buddhas emerging from all the pores of my body, bejeweled in thirty-two ways, and adorned in turn with eighty kinds of beauty.

source_sentence: 我當遣至無佛世界、有佛世界及五濁界，若彼世界有五逆人，毀壞正法，誹謗聖人，乃至斷諸善根，有學聲聞、緣覺、大乘，毀破諸戒，墮於大罪，燒滅善心，滅失善道，墮在生死空曠澤中，行諸邪道，登涉罪山。
translation: I will send them to the world without buddhas, the world with buddhas, and the five turbid realms, and if there are five rebellious people in those worlds who disparage the right teaching, denigrate sages, and cut off good roots, train in the śrāvaka, pratyekabuddha, or great vehicle, violate precepts, fall into great crimes, burn up good thoughts, disillusion the good path, fall into the vast expanse of birth-and-death, practice wrong paths, and climb mountains of transgressions.

source_sentence: 如是眾生百千萬億，一一化佛一日之中遍為說法，或有奉事魔醯首羅，隨作其形而為說法。
translation: Thus, there are a hundred thousand million million sentient beings, each of whom is transformed into a Buddha who speaks for them throughout the day, or there are those who serve Mahêśvara and speak according to their form.

source_sentence: 亦於爾時稱我名字而讚歎之。
translation: At the time, they also called me by my name and praised me.

source_sentence: 願是眾生聞讚歎我，心生歡喜，種諸善根生我世界。
translation: May these sentient beings hear my praise and become joyous in their hearts, planting good roots that will give rise to my world.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: "'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是諸眾生若臨終時，我不在其前為演說法令心淨者，我於未來終不成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: "If I don't explain the mental purity of these sentient beings before them at the time of their death, I won't attain supreme perfect enlightenment in the future.

source_sentence: 若彼眾生命終之後墮三惡道，不生我國受人身者，我之所知無量正法悉當滅失，所有佛事皆不成就；事那羅延者亦復如是。
translation: If those sentient beings fall into the three evil destinies after their lives end and aren't born in our country and accepted as human beings, my knowledge of measureless right teachings will all perish, and none of the Buddha-works will be accomplished; so it will be with those who serve Narayan.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: "'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，願令他方世界所有五逆之人，乃至行諸邪道，登涉罪山，如是眾生臨命終時，悉來集聚生我世界，隨其本相所受身色，艾白無潤，面目醜陋，如毘舍遮，失念破戒，臭穢短命，以此諸惡損減其身，資生所須常不供足。
translation: After I achieve supreme perfect enlightenment, I want to cause all the five heinous people in other worlds, even those who practice wrong paths and ascend mountains of transgressions, and such sentient beings as they approach the end of their lives to gather here and be born in our world, according to their original appearances, with bodies that are white and lusterless, with ugly faces like a piśācī, that lose mindfulness and break precepts, that stink, and that lack life, and that are constantly denied the necessities of life.

source_sentence: 為是眾生故，於娑婆世界諸四天下，一時之中，從兜術下現處母胎，乃至童子，學諸伎藝，出家苦行，破壞諸魔，成無上道，轉正法輪，般涅槃後流布舍利。
translation: For the sake of these sentient beings, they appear in their mother's womb under the four heavens of the sahā world at one time, from the time they descend from Tuṣita down to the time they're a child, train in various arts and crafts, leave home and engage in ascetic practices, destroy Māra, achieve the unsurpassed path, turn the right wheel of the Dharma, and spread relics after parinirvāṇa.

source_sentence: 如是示現種種佛事，悉皆遍滿如是百億諸四天下。
translation: Such manifestations of various Buddha-works all pervade these ten billion of the four worlds.

source_sentence: 悲華經卷第六
translation: Compassionate Flower Sutra, Volume 6
